marketplace
Class SellerAgent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ciagent.CIAgent
        |
        +--marketplace.SellerAgent
Direct Known Subclasses:
BestSellerAgent, BetterSellerAgent
public class SellerAgent
extends CIAgent

The SellerAgent class implements a very simple seller agent.

See Also:
